description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Slow Roasted Pork Shoulder With Green Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sticky Slow Roasted Pork Shoulder With Green Salsa
name: Sticky Slow Roasted Pork Shoulder With Green Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer corn to a serving platter. Slice some of the pork, place on the platter and drizzle with some of the salsa. Add the unsliced pork to platter, garnish with coriander. Serve with remaining salsa and lime cheeks.
